rules_text:
As long as you control a creature token, Spirit Bonded Monk has, “Whenever Spirit Bonded Monk deals combat damage to a player, proliferate.” [i](To proliferate, choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)[/i]
{3}{U}: Adapt 2 [i](If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put two +1/+1 counters on it.)[/i]
